wikipedia_page.main:
Walter Cooper 

(dates unknown) was an English cricketer. A left-hand bat and slow left-arm orthodox bowler, he played three matches for Essex sporadically between 1905 and 1910. He failed to take a wicket and made only 32 runs in his career.

response: * Walter Cooper (mayor) ( 1845 – 1941), 21st Mayor of Christchurch, New Zealand
